Direct Cellars Wine Club Overview from Direct Cellars on Vimeo

Free Wine!

Direct Cellars supports 2,000 boutique vineyards around the globe producing artisan wines that can't be found in stores.

As a customer you can join the wine club for $49 (2 - bottles) or $79 (4 -bottles) a month. You can choose white, red or both. The wines are hand selected for you by our wine experts and shipped to your doorstep.

Do you have 3 friends who would love to get premium WINE for FREE?

If they sign up though your referral link...YOUR WINE IS FREE the following month!

Who doesn't LOVE premium wine for free?!
